name: Dual tv news
description:
At the beginning of the game you have 25 seconds to remember the card symbols and their locations.
You will then participate in a crazy political interview with the subject of your participation in the presidential elections.
Each journalist asks you a different question but you only have time to answer one, so choose the most relevant one! But don't ignore a journalist too much or you'll be kicked off the set...
To answer the journalist you will have to select a card opposite to the symbol he imposes in his question

The cards :

Sword/Shield

Fire/Water
Sea/Mountain

Light/Darkness

Heart/Death

Game Designer

Arthur Parmentier

 Game Programmer :

Macéo Prévost / Freddy Maupou

 Game Artist : 

Lilian Clairville
